All Classes

Class Summary
Class Description
AbstractDAO<T>
Generic class with methods for communicating with the database through queries
AppFrame<T>
Generic class implements methods common to all the frames of the GUI
Application
The main class of the app, starts the app
ConnectionFactory
Class for database connectivity
Customer
Class implements the table customer from the database
CustomerBLL
Class implements the logic behind the Customer object
CustomerController
Class that controls the CustomerView
CustomerDAO
Class with methods for communicating with the database through queries related to Customer(extends AbstractDAO)
CustomerValidator
Class contains methods to validate a Customer
CustomerView
Class implements the aspect of the Customer frame
InitialView
Class implements the initial view of the GUI
MainController
Class used to start the application, it generates the Controllers for the other interfaces
Order
Class implements the table order from the database
OrderBLL
Class implements the logic behind the Order object
OrderController
Class to control the OrderView interface
OrderDAO
Class with methods for communicating with the database through queries related to Order(extends AbstractDAO)
OrderProduct
Class implements the table orderproduct from the database
OrderProductBLL
Class implements the logic behind the OrderProduct object
OrderProductDAO
Class with methods for communicating with the database through queries related to OrderProduct(extends AbstractDAO)
OrderValidator
Class contains methods to validate an Order
OrderView
Class implements the aspect of the Order frame
Product
Class implements the table product from the database
ProductBLL
Class implements the logic behind the Product object
ProductController
Class that controls the ProductView
ProductDAO
Class with methods for communicating with the database through queries related to Product(extends AbstractDAO)
ProductValidator
Class contains methods to validate a Product
ProductView
Class implements the aspect of the Product frame
